poster: R A M M I X
title: Gnar and Nidalee!
body:
So, my girlfriend recently found out about League of Legends, she didn't play yet, but she felt in love with Gnar!
She decided to draw him and Nidalee, because she thinks they go really good together ^^

What do you think about it? :)

http://img10.deviantart.net/6ad1/i/2017/031/2/b/gnar_and_nidalee__by_poisewritik-daxdmo0.jpg

Here's her DeviantArt if you would like to see more of her art: http://poisewritik.deviantart.com/ ^^

replies.body:

Need your eyes checked, that's Nid, not Lee.
He might have meant "gnar-_ly_", as in it appearing to be a snuggle-struggle for him.
